user_query: I'm planning a trip to attend a Formula 1 race and need assistance selecting a race based on the race number, getting fixture details, retrieving the latest betting odds, and suggesting popular matches to watch.

TaskList.description: Query the upcoming Formula 1 race schedule based on the specified race number.
Retrieve the detailed fixture information for the selected Formula 1 race.
Fetch the latest betting odds for the selected race.
Suggest popular matches or events around the same time or location as the selected race.
